trustfund:
TF030867-SPANISH CTF - FY07 - ALL BANK
            BORROWING MEMBER COUNTRIES/ALL SECTORS, A,TF051884-PHRD-TURKEY: HEALTH SECTOR
            TRANSFORMATION REFORM,TF053080-RESOURCE ALLOCATION AND
            PURCHASING OF BASIC HEALTH CARE

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed restructuring for Turkey
            health transition project will revise the project
            development objective (PDO) for HTP-I as well as the key
            project performance indicators in order to measure the
            revised PDO, reduce the number of project components from
            seven to six, cut some sub-components and introduce new
            sub-components, integrate the functions and responsibilities
            of the Project Implementation Unit (PIU) into the Ministry
            of Health (MOH) line departments, synchronize project
            investments to areas of health reforms that are of high
            priority and which are underway, reallocate loan funds
            across expenditure categories in line with proposed project
            changes, and extend the closing date of the Project from
            December 31, 2007 to December 31, 2008.
